events.message: The applicant has submitted their personal loan application seeking funds for covering upcoming medical expenses and consolidating existing debt.
Loan application has been categorised under personal loans given the nature of expenses listed such as medical bills and debt consolidation.
A dedicated loan officer has been assigned to guide the applicant through the steps of their personal loan process.
The initial review of the application showed all required fields completed, but further information was needed regarding income verification.
Applicant was requested to provide recent pay stubs, medical bills documentation, and bank statements for debt assessment.
Applicant successfully submitted the requested documents including pay stubs, medical invoices, and credit card statements.
Credit check was completed showing a credit score in the fair range, with some previous late payments but overall responsible borrowing history.
The risk assessment identified moderate risk primarily due to recent medical debt, but overall the applicant has stable income.
A loan offer including interest rate and repayment schedule was presented to the applicant for their personal loan consideration.
The applicant provided positive feedback on the loan offer and requested minor adjustments to the repayment terms.
Application was escalated for manager review in order to consider the applicant’s requested repayment term modifications.
The loan has been approved by management reflecting adjusted repayment terms as requested by the applicant.
The funds for the approved personal loan have been successfully disbursed to the applicant’s bank account.
A follow-up call was made to confirm satisfaction with disbursement and clarity on repayment schedule moving forward.
The loan application case has been closed successfully as all processes were completed and the applicant accepted the terms.
